metadata.name: Disable Music In Pause Menu
metadata.description:
[b]Disable Music In Pause Menu[/b] [i]Version:[/i] 1.0 [i]Compatibility:[/i] Repentance (needs Repentogon) [i]Author:[/i] emp0ry
[b]Description:[/b] Mutes music when you pause in-game and turns it back on when you resume or go to the main menu. Works only with [url=https://repentogon.com/]Repentogon[/url]. Check the project on [url=https://github.com/emp0ry/Disable-Music-In-Pause-Menu]GitHub[/url]!
[b]Features:[/b] - Music OFF when paused, ON when unpaused - Music always ON in main menu - Simple and smooth
